plot: After being fired, Griswell decides to start eating crickets in an attempt to save money. He also attempts to find a friend and be loved, an obsession represented by continual consumption and eventual destruction of life itself.
title: Farewell, Mr. Griswell
plot_es: After being fired, Griswell decides to start eating crickets in an attempt to save money. He also attempts to find a friend and be loved, an obsession represented by continual consumption and eventual destruction of life itself.
plot_en: After being fired, Griswell decides to start eating crickets in an attempt to save money. He also attempts to find a friend and be loved, an obsession represented by continual consumption and eventual destruction of life itself.
